content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping for a higher rental price. May I suggest 900 Euros per month? This would be a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 850 Euros per month.

Is that acceptable to you?

I also want to mention that I am a student and I am very responsible. I will take good care of the apartment and pay all the rent on time.

I would also appreciate it if you could provide me with some information about the utilities, such as electricity, water, and gas.

I would also like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
I understand your offer of 850 Euros per month, but I am still looking for a higher rental price. May I suggest 950 Euros per month? This would be a fair market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich.

Regarding utilities, I can provide you with an estimate based on the average consumption in the area. However, please note that the actual costs may vary depending on your usage. I will provide you with more detailed information once you have signed the lease agreement.

As for additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit required. This is a common practice in Germany and is usually equivalent to one month's rent. I will discuss this with you further during the lease negotiation process.

Thank you for your interest in my apartment and for being a responsible tenant. I look forward to discussing the rental price with you further.
name: Heinrich Heine
